name: Controller_Control.Ice_Control
display_help: You can draw moisture from the air to create Icy formations. With these abilities, you can control ice with remarkable precision to dominate your foes.

powers.name: Controller_Control.Ice_Control.Chilblain
powers.display_help: Immobilizes your target in an icy trap, dealing some Cold damage over time as well as slightly slowing the target's attack and movement speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast

4.0 immobilize for 27.94s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Ice_Control.Block_of_Ice
powers.display_help: You can freeze a single foe in a Block of Ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be Slowed and take some Cold damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Controller_Control.Ice_Control.Frostbite
powers.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes in icy traps. Deals minimal Cold damage over time and slightly Slows the targets. Slower and less damaging than Chilblain, but can capture multiple targets. More resilient foes may only be Slowed. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Cold), Foe Immobilize, -SPD, -Recharge

powers.name: Controller_Control.Ice_Control.Artic_Air
powers.display_help: While this power is active, you are surrounded in a fog of Arctic Air that dramatically slows the attack and movement speed of nearby foes. The chill of Arctic Air is so bitter that many foes are forced to flee, albeit very slowly, from the immediate area. Others may attack their own allies, as the fog from the Arctic Air is thick and can cause much confusion. The cold air can also reduced the stealth capability of affected foes. Recharge: Slow

display_info: -62.50% strength to recharge for 2.25s on target
Ignores buffs and enhancements

powers.name: Controller_Control.Ice_Control.Shiver
powers.display_help: You can blast forth a wide cone of chilling air that dramatically Slows the movement and attack rate of nearby foes. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 135° arc (16 targets max)

display_info: -81.25% strength to jump height, recharge for 18s on target
Ignores buffs and enhancements
-81.25% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 18s on target
-350.00% max run speed for 18s on target
Ignores buffs and enhancements

powers.name: Controller_Control.Ice_Control.Ice_Slick
powers.display_help: You can create a large patch of ice at a targeted area, causing all foes that pass through it to lose their footing. Those caught in the Ice Slick are dramatically slowed, tend to fall down and will be unable to jump. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Controller_Control.Ice_Control.Flash_Freeze
powers.display_help: You can Flash Freeze a large patch of ground beneath a targeted foe, instantly forming dozens of deadly ice shards that do Cold damage to all enemies in the area. The victims are left trapped within the icicles, but can break free if disturbed. Only targets near the ground can be affected. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Cold/Lethal), Foe Sleep

powers.name: Controller_Control.Ice_Control.Glacier
powers.display_help: You can freeze all foes around yourself in blocks of Glacial ice. The targets are frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. Even after the victims emerge, they remain chilled and their attack and movement speed is Slowed for a while. This power can only be cast near the ground. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Controller_Control.Ice_Control.Jack_Frost
powers.display_help: You can create a very powerful entity of animated ice at a targeted location. Jack Frost possesses several ice powers to attack any nearby foes and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Summon Jack Frost: Melee Moderate DMG(Cold)
